alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 12:26AM EDT until June 15 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1126 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Marianna to 8 miles north of Blountstown to 18 miles northwest of Stonemill Creek, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marianna, Chattahoochee, Sneads, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Altha, Moose Pond, Blue Spring, Union City, Henderson Mill, Camps Head, Lovedale, Dellwood, Star, Hornsville, Alliance, Buena Vista, Marianna Municipal A/P, Chason and Haynes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
